QuestData.Title: Thunderdrome: Sarinexx!
QuestData.Description: I hope you're ready for the next one, $n. One mistake could mean instant, painful death! But that's what the people pay to see, isn't it?$B$BI hope you're not afraid of bugs...
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Katrina Turner at Gadgetzan in Tanaris.
QuestData.CompletionText: Stop wasting my time. Enter and fight!
QuestData.RewardText: Rather impressive. Few can bear to see a silithid reaver face to face, let alone defeat it.
